co.cask.cdap.api

Interface Admin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessagingAdmin, SecureStoreManager

    @Beta
public interface Admin
extends SecureStoreManager, MessagingAdmin
    This interface provides methods for operational calls from within a CDAP application.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • datasetExists

        boolean datasetExists(String name)
                      throws DatasetManagementException
        Check whether a dataset exists in the current namespace.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the dataset
        Returns:
        whether a dataset of that name exists
        Throws:
        DatasetManagementException - for any issues encountered in the dataset system

      • getDatasetType

        String getDatasetType(String name)
                      throws DatasetManagementException
        Get the type of a dataset.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of a dataset
        Returns:
        the type of the dataset, if it exists; null otherwise
        Throws:
        InstanceNotFoundException - if the dataset does not exist
        DatasetManagementException - for any issues encountered in the dataset system

      • getDatasetProperties

        DatasetProperties getDatasetProperties(String name)
                                       throws DatasetManagementException
        Get the properties with which a dataset was created or updated.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the dataset
        Returns:
        The properties that were used to create or update the dataset, or null if the dataset does not exist.
        Throws:
        InstanceNotFoundException - if the dataset does not exist
        DatasetManagementException - for any issues encountered in the dataset system

      • createDataset

        void createDataset(String name,
                 String type,
                 DatasetProperties properties)
                   throws DatasetManagementException
        Create a new dataset instance.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new dataset
        type - the type of the dataset to create
        properties - the properties for the new dataset
        Throws:
        InstanceConflictException - if the dataset already exists
        DatasetManagementException - for any issues encountered in the dataset system, or if the dataset type's create method fails.

      • updateDataset

        void updateDataset(String name,
                 DatasetProperties properties)
                   throws DatasetManagementException
        Update an existing dataset with new properties.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the dataset
        properties - the new properties for the dataset
        Throws:
        InstanceNotFoundException - if the dataset does not exist
        DatasetManagementException - for any issues encountered in the dataset system, or if the dataset type's update method fails.

      • dropDataset

        void dropDataset(String name)
                 throws DatasetManagementException
        Delete a dataset instance.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the dataset
        Throws:
        InstanceNotFoundException - if the dataset does not exist
        DatasetManagementException - for any issues encountered in the dataset system, or if the dataset type's drop method fails.

      • truncateDataset

        void truncateDataset(String name)
                     throws DatasetManagementException
        Truncate a dataset, that is, delete all its data.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the dataset
        Throws:
        InstanceNotFoundException - if the dataset does not exist
        DatasetManagementException - for any issues encountered in the dataset system, or if the dataset type's truncate method fails.
